channel.title: Comments on: Add Google Fonts with Kirki to any Genesis Theme
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/listings/add-google-fonts-with-kirki-to-any-genesis-theme/#comment-520">nick duell</a>.
Thanks for sharing, Nick! Have mentioned in this week's round-up:
http://genesiswp.guide/2016-06-10/
item.content:encoded:
In reply to nick duell.

Thanks for sharing, Nick! Have mentioned in this week’s round-up:

item.title: By: nick duell
item.dc:creator: nick duell
item.description: In this blog post I run through how to add ALL the Google fonts as an option in the customiser for the Site Header, Headings and body fonts in your theme using the Kirki plugin and few code snippets.
item.content:encoded: In this blog post I run through how to add ALL the Google fonts as an option in the customiser for the Site Header, Headings and body fonts in your theme using the Kirki plugin and few code snippets.
